text: Salvator Pélégry (25 March 1898 - 16 February 1965) was a French swimmer. He competed in two events at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1898 births Category:1965 deaths Category:French male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of France Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Var (department)
title: Salvator Pélégry
